category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_derivative_output_location_folder
preference.preference_description: Defines the default folder location to put the output objects created by CAE Derivative Rules. The Valid Values: * "Newstuff": the output objects will be pasted in the user's"Newstuff" folder. This is the default value. * The UID of an alternative folder: To identify an alternative folder, use the rich client user interface through the Edit/Options panel.
